articles.author: Lenore Manderson
articles.title: From fatal allergies to heart attacks and cholera – the devastating health effects of global warming in Africa - The Conversation
articles.description: Africa’s future looks catastrophic if we don’t act now on climate change.
articles.content: The winds that whip the towns of the Eastern Cape in South Africa have the power to generate energy. But on a dry, hot day, those winds can gather up embers and dump them into tinder dry savannah and… [+5500 chars]
